titles.title: Summary of gas analyses and elemental spectral analyses of sublimates from Biloikai crater, a subsidiary volcano of Klyuchevskoy (Kamchatka, Russia), 1938-1939

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This is a summary of geochemical analyses of fumarole gases and rendered gas by-products from lavaflows from Biloikai crater, a subsidiary crater of Klyuchevskvoy, by CI. Naboko of Kamachatka Volcanology Station 1938-1939. Spectral analyses of rendered gas by-products from a lava flow from Biloikai crater are non-quantitative and reported as detects only. Fumarole gas analyses are also from Biloikai crater and consist of H2O and HCl only.
volatiles, volcanic gas, fumarole gas, volcanoes, vapor condensates, rendered gas by-products, sublimates, lavaflow deposits

geoLocation.geoLocationPlace: Russia, Kamchatka, Klyuchevskaya, Klyuchev, Klyuchevskoy, Biloikai Crater
